tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE podcast_episodes (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_title VARCHAR(255),
    episode_description TEXT,
    release_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT
)

CREATE TABLE episode_metadata (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    podcast_id INT,
    episode_title VARCHAR(255),
    publish_date DATE,
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE listener_data (
    listener_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    episode_id INT,
    listen_date DATE,
    playback_position_sec INT,
    rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE episodes (
 episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 episode_name VARCHAR(255),
 episode_description TEXT,
 release_date TIMESTAMP,
 duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE listeners (
 listener_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 listener_name VARCHAR(255),
 email VARCHAR(255),
 subscription_status BOOLEAN,
 favorite_genre VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE listener_episode_mapping (
 mapping_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 listener_id INT,
 episode_id INT,
 rating FLOAT,
 timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Episodes (
    episode_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    podcast_id INT,
    episode_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    episode_description TEXT,
    release_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE EpisodeListeners (
    listener_id INT,
    episode_id INT,
    listen_date TIMESTAMP,
    duration_listened_minutes INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (listener_id) REFERENCES Listeners(listener_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (episode_id) REFERENCES Episodes(episode_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Episodes (
  episode_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  podcast_id UUID,
  episode_title TEXT,
  release_date DATE,
  duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE Podcasts (
  podcast_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  podcast_name TEXT,
  host_name TEXT,
  category TEXT,
  description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Listeners (
  listener_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  listener_name TEXT,
  email TEXT,
  join_date DATE,
  country TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Subscriptions (
  subscription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  listener_id UUID,
  podcast_id UUID,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Ratings (
  rating_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  listener_id UUID,
  podcast_id UUID,
  rating INT,
  comment TEXT
);
